greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-x)/(1+4*x^2).
comment: Hankel transform of 1,1,0,2,0,6,0,70,... (which has g.f. 1+x/sqrt(1-4x^2). See A126869).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,-4)
mathematica: Rest[CoefficientList[Series[x*(1 - x)/(1 + 4*x^2), {x,0,50}], x]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 11 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Aug 10 2009
